subject: assert returns void, i wish it didn't
msgSnippet: Hi, So all the various assert methods all return void.  How would I go about getting a boolean telling me the result of an assert? I need to do something with
messageBody:
Hi,

So all the various assert methods all return void. How would I go
about getting a boolean telling me the result of an assert? I need to
do something with this information.

Mike
